module.name: ap210_production_rule
module.keywords: module, rule system, rule management, rule attributes, rule representation, rule set, rule grouping

abstract.p: the representation of production rules, commonly used as design rules. This data includes support for rule creation, management, assignment to product data or features, assignment to product or requirement parameters. Complete use of this capability requires use of external definition for the expressions. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided. Guidance for mapping instance data to commercial production rule systems is provided.
abstract.li: rules that define a constraint by relating two elements based upon characteristics of a design;

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of production rules, commonly used as design rules. This data includes support for rule creation, management, assignment to product data or features, assignment to product or requirement parameters. Complete use of this capability requires use of external definition for the expressions. Configuration management information and design management information is provided. Guidance for mapping instance data to commercial production rule systems is provided.
